title: IModelDocExtension.GetSunLightSourcePropertyValues
description: Gets the property values for a sunlight source.
signature:

   out MathVector
NorthDirection
,
   out System.Double
NorthLatitude
,
   out System.Double
EastLongitude
,
   out System.Double
TimeZone
,
   out System.String
DateTime
)

returns: True if getting the value is successful, false if not
